title: Question:
author: IOTEN Network
content: IOTEN aims to be a fast, deflationary, “ultra-secure" and decentralized blockchain network. IOTEN seeks to democratize access to DApps, linking the physical and digital worlds, providing value to users and fueling the new economy of the machines. Users of decentralized network, developers, and businesses that control and use the platform collaboratively will build the interconnected IOTEN network.In order to compete with other similar niched blockchains, IOTEN will rely on its Randomized Delegated Proof-of-Stake consensus (Roll-DPoS) and zk-SNARKs to improve the scalability and security of its blockchain.Buy now on pancakeswap/contract:            0xabe6efdefa75c18bd0f6b65abddcd8dda3992cafWebsite: www.ioten.network

comments.author: IOTEN Network
comments.body: IOTN testnet achieved 3.8k tps so far
